snippet: The new investment values the start-up at about $1.75 billion, or nearly double the valuation attached to its financing round last summer.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The new investment values the start-up at about $1.75 billion, or nearly double the valuation attached to its financing round last summer.

headline.main: Andreessen Horowitz Invests Another $52 Million in Network Start-Up Tanium
